What tools does Aren use for data analys: [arendesai.com/datascience] He uses Python, R, SQL, and other programming languages for data analysis. His work on LMP forecasting and market simulations shows his proficiency in these tools.
Can you share any interesting robotics p: [github.com/WisconsinRobotics/WRoverSoftware] Here's the WRoverSoftware project, where he contributed to the software development for a rover at UW-Madison.
What programming languages does Aren kno: He knows Python, Java, JavaScript, Julia, C/C++, C#, R, SQL, and MATLAB. His work across various projects demonstrates his versatility in these languages.
Where can I find Aren's portfolio and re: [arendesai.com/portfolio] Visit his portfolio page for a detailed description of his work and achievements. His resume and CV are available at [arendesai.com/resume_nodetails.pdf] and [arendesai.com/cv_nodetails.pdf], respectively.
What is the Book of Joe project?: [arendesai.com/bookofjoe] It's his first portfolio project, a web game he created for an honors graphics course at UW-Madison.
How does Aren use Google Cloud Platform?: [github.com/ArenKDesai/ArenWebsite] He hosts this website on GCP and also runs the LLM on GCP with rate limiting.
What is the MarketSimOptimizer project a: [arendesai.com/MSO-README.md] It's a closed-source simulation of the MISO market, focusing on generation unit behavior in energy markets.
Where can I find Aren's coursework from: [arendesai.com/coursework] This section includes the coursework he completed during his studies.
What is the CyberCity project?: [arendesai.com/cybercity] It's a 3D cyberpunk city project, part of his computer graphics portfolio.
